scripts.build: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" yarn build:deps && yarn build:prod
scripts.build:clean: lerna run build:clean --scope app --scope homepage && rimraf www
scripts.build:prod: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=4096" lerna run build  --scope homepage --stream && lerna run build --scope app --stream && lerna run copy-assets --scope app --stream
scripts.postinstall: yarn lerna run install-dependencies --stream --concurrency 1 --ignore smooshpack --ignore react-smooshpack && opencollective postinstall
scripts.start: yarn build:deps && cross-env NODE_ENV=development lerna run start --scope @codesandbox/common --scope @codesandbox/components --scope app --parallel
scripts.start:dev_api: (tmux new-session -d -s csb "NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=8192 concurrently --raw 'cd packages/app && yarn start:dev_api' 'cd packages/common && yarn start' 'cd packages/components && yarn start'" || tmux attach -t csb) && tmux attach -t csb
scripts.start:fast: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently --raw "cd packages/app && yarn start" "cd packages/common && yarn start" "cd packages/components && yarn start"
scripts.start:profiling: cross-env NODE_ENV=production PROFILING=true concurrently --raw "cd packages/app && yarn start" "cd packages/common && yarn start" "cd packages/components && yarn start"
scripts.start:hot: cross-env NODE_ENV=development APP_ONLY=true concurrently --raw "cd packages/app && yarn start" "cd packages/common && yarn start" "cd packages/components && yarn start"
scripts.start:fast:stream: cross-env ENDPOINT=https://codesandbox.stream NODE_ENV=development concurrently --raw "cd packages/app && yarn start" "cd packages/common && yarn start" "cd packages/components && yarn start"
scripts.start:fast:local: cross-env ENDPOINT=http://localhost:4000 NODE_ENV=development concurrently --raw "cd packages/app && yarn start" "cd packages/common && yarn start" "cd packages/components && yarn start"
scripts.start:overmind: yarn build:deps && concurrently "lerna run start --scope app --stream" "overmind-devtools"
scripts.start:vscode: cross-env VSCODE=1 yarn start:fast & cd standalone-packages/monaco-editor && yarn simpleserver & cd standalone-packages/vscode && yarn watch
scripts.test:jest-lite: lerna exec --scope app --stream -- yarn run test jest-lite --watch --coverage
